ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And I d just like the add coming to these language exchanges can be very much worth your time.  After Saturday s session (hosted by Zalbar) I now speak 4
ygData.messageBody:
> Of a certainty. Just ask Chen who attended one of our
> language lessons
> on Solusek Ro. He was running around clutching his head and
> screaming.
> Passing out and all. Too funny. But to get to the meat of
> the story, yes.You
> DO have to zone to see an improvement or a new language.

And I'd just like the add coming to these language exchanges can be
very much worth your time. After Saturday's session (hosted by
Zalbar) I now speak 4 languages excellently, and about 8 others around
average. Even though not all of them are useful, I think it's fun to
be able to speak to everyone in their own language.

Aznyin
Level 17 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
